name: cleaver-search
description: Cleaver Search - A SaaS platform to optimize website content for Large Language Models

scripts.clean: docker compose down -v && docker system prune -f
scripts.db:migrate: docker compose exec backend npm run db:migrate:safe
scripts.db:studio: docker compose exec backend sh -c "cd /app && npx drizzle-kit studio --port 4983 --host 0.0.0.0"
scripts.install: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend

author: Ali Akbar Alizada
